wikipedia_page.main: Geoffrey Burton (born 23 July 1885, date of death unknown) was a British hurdler. He competed in the men's 400 metres hurdles at the 1908 Summer Olympics.

link_mentions.page: Athletics at the 1908 Summer Olympics – Men's 400 metres hurdles

response: Geoffrey Cecil Burton (14 December 1909 – 4 April 1986) was an English first-class cricketer active 1930 who played for Middlesex. He was born in Stamford Hill; died in Eastbourne.Geoffrey Burton at ESPNcricinfo
